subIntro: With the protocol to tokenize real estate into digital assets, REALNEXTATE opens up investment opportunities in the potential real estate market, with just a few clicks
locationInputDes: Where do you looking for to invest?
mostPotentialCitiesDesc: These cites are potential place for you to make your investment
featuredPlaceToInvestDesc: Popular places to invest that Realnextate recommends for you
whyYouChoseUsDesc: Realnextate allows you to buy small pieces of real estate so you only need to spend a small amount of capital to invest. Besides, Realnextate is very secure and reliable. We are committed to your satisfaction.
experiencedBrokerDesc: Tuning the international digital asset investor community with potential and passion for Real Estate investment in Vietnam
securePaymentDesc: Realnextate only tokenizes Real Estates that meet the legal criteria according to the Law of Vietnam and the Appraisal Unit
pioneeringTechnologyDesc: With Smart Contract from Binance's Blockchain platform, investors can easily invest small size of 1/1000 and get transparent profit sharing
multiPlatform: APPLICATION SUPPORT IOS AND ANDROID PLATFORM
multiPlatformDesc: Easy to invest, withdraw and transfer money with mobile apps on both iOS and Android platforms
